feed.title: EatPal Blog - Tips for Picky Eaters & ARFID
feed.subtitle: Expert advice on managing picky eating, ARFID strategies, food chaining techniques, and family meal planning. Evidence-based guidance from feeding specialists.

entry.title: Understanding Food Chaining Therapy for Picky Eaters
entry.summary: Learn how food chaining therapy helps children systematically expand their diet from 5 foods to 50+ by building chains from safe foods. Discover evidence-based techniques developed by feeding therapy specialists.

entry.title: 10 Evidence-Based Strategies for ARFID Management
entry.summary: Expert tips on managing Avoidant/Restrictive Food Intake Disorder (ARFID) with proven feeding therapy techniques. Learn how to support children with ARFID through structured meal planning and exposure therapy.

entry.title: The Science Behind Try Bites: Why 15-20 Exposures Matter
entry.summary: Research shows children need 15-20 exposures to a new food before acceptance. Learn the science behind try bites and how to implement them effectively in your family's meal routine.

entry.title: Helping Kids with Sensory Food Preferences
entry.summary: Understanding sensory processing challenges and how they affect eating. Practical strategies for introducing new textures and flavors to sensory-sensitive children.

entry.title: Weekly Meal Planning for Multiple Picky Eaters
entry.summary: Master the art of meal planning when each child has different food preferences. Tips for creating balanced, stress-free family meals that everyone can enjoy.

entry.title: Ensuring Adequate Nutrition with a Limited Diet
entry.summary: How to monitor nutrition when your child eats only 5-10 foods. Learn about nutrient gaps, supplementation, and working with healthcare providers for picky eaters.
